Detailed Description

A layout that lets you specify exact locations (x/y coordinates) of its children.

AbsoluteLayout is based on the simple idea of placing each control at an absolute position. You specify the exact x and y coordinates on the screen for each control.

 AbsoluteController* al = new AbsoluteController(this);
 TextWidget* tw = new TextWidget(this);
 tw->setText("Hello World");
 AbsoluteControllerParams* acp = new AbsoluteControllerParams(
     ControllerParams::WRAP_CONTENT, ControllerParams::WRAP_CONTENT, 0, 0);
 rl->addWidget(tw, acp);
